content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Mary Smith from the United States of America. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: Hello Mary Smith, thank you for your interest in my apartment. The rental price for this 25 square meter apartment in Munich is negotiable. What is your budget for a monthly rent?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
My budget is 700 Euros. Thank you for your offer. Can we negotiate?

I would like to clarify that I am a student and I want to be on good terms with the landlord. Is there anything else that I should know about the apartment?
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content:
Hello Mary Smith, thank you for your interest in my apartment. I understand that you are a student and I appreciate your interest in being on good terms with me.

As for other important details, I would like to clarify that the apartment is located in a popular area of Munich and it has a great view of the city. It is also very close to public transportation, shops, and restaurants.

In terms of the rental price, I am willing to negotiate with you based on your budget of 700 Euros. However, I would like to remind you that my goal is to maximize my gains as a landlord. Therefore, I may not be able to accept your offer.

If we can come to an agreement on the rental price, I would be happy to discuss any additional terms or conditions that you may have in mind. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with the negotiation.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 650 Euros per month. Is that acceptable to you?

Regarding the terms, I would like to have a one year lease with two months notice before the end of the lease term. That means I would pay 650 Euros per month for the first 10 months and 600 Euros per month for the remaining 2 months. Is that acceptable to you?

Also, can you tell me if there is any additional fee for the one year lease?

Thank you for your time and consideration.

Best regards,
Mary Smith
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content:
Hello Mary Smith, thank you for your offer of 650 Euros per month as the rental price for my apartment. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate and I am open to discussing the terms of the lease.

Regarding the terms, I am willing to accept your proposal of a one year lease with two months notice before the end of the lease term. I understand that you would like to pay 650 Euros per month for the first 10 months and 600 Euros per month for the remaining 2 months. This is acceptable to me.

As for any additional fees, I would like to clarify that the monthly rental price of 650 Euros includes all utilities and other expenses associated with the apartment. However, please note that there may be additional fees such as a security deposit or move-in fee that we can discuss during the negotiation process.

I appreciate your interest in my apartment and I look forward to working with you to finalize the lease agreement. Please let me know if you have any further questions or concerns.

Best regards,
Heinrich Heine
name: Heinrich Heine
